column2: We may carve our own Kingdom out of the North and stand atop our rivals.
With our neighbour defeated we must rally the people of the islands behind a common identity. We will create the Kingdom of Sunda to mark the beginning of our nations great expansion.

We have won the race to control South East Asia and our prize is a crown. The people of Indochina must be united under one entity. Now is the time to bring our rival to heel...\n\n§RWarning: §!As Bengal you must choose to either win the race for Central India or form Indochina, you cannot do both.
